# Introduction

Welcome to "Solving Statistical Problems", a compilation of problem-solving tools and tricks for graduate-level Probability and Statistical Inference courses. This site is currently under construction in preparation for the 2023 Harvard Biostatistics PhD Qualifying Exam, so stay tuned!
